definition.text: This indicator is an adaptation of Markos Katsanos' VFI. It is an enhanced version of the On Balance Volume Indicator (OBV) but produces an oscillating output value instead of a meaningless number.

paragraphs.text: The indicator's output can be read in a similar way to the MACD, where values above zero indicate an uptrend and vice versa.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| VolumeFlow | VF | value, signal, histo |
The parameters for the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Volume Flow" Procedure Loop.
